Package com.erudika.para.utils

Class HttpUtils

java.lang.Object
com.erudika.para.utils.HttpUtils
public final class HttpUtils
extends Object
Various utilities for HTTP stuff - cookies, AJAX, etc.
Author:
Alex Bogdanovski [alex@erudika.com]
